identity.name: Coords
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Military HUD precision with Logistics utility.
Emotion First: The user feels like an Air Traffic Controller.
Content is King: The Map and Data are the heroes; UI gets out of the way.
Density over Whitespace: High-density information display (Control Tower vibe).
Actionable Signals: Color is used strictly for status/alerts, not decoration.

headings.usage: Page titles, widget headers, major metrics

mono.usage: Protocol Lab, IDs, Coordinates, Hash Validation, Timestamps

styles.h1: font-heading text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase
styles.h2: font-heading text-2xl md:text-3xl font-semibold tracking-tight uppercase text-muted-foreground/90
styles.label: font-mono text-xs uppercase tracking-widest text-muted-foreground

rules: NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, deep blacks/grays.
Use 1px borders for separation instead of shadows.
Status colors (Red/Green/Amber) should be vivid and used for data points only.

containers.panel: bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-md border border-border/50 rounded-sm shadow-2xl

buttons.primary: rounded-none bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-primary-foreground font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-4 py-2 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-none border border-border hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-xs px-4 py-2
buttons.ghost: rounded-none hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground font-mono uppercase text-xs

inputs.default: rounded-none border-border bg-background font-mono text-sm focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary focus:border-primary placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

map.overlay_style: absolute z-10 bg-black/80 backdrop-blur border border-white/10 p-4

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-blur-xl bg-black/60 border border-white/10 (For Map Overlays)
visual_enhancers.scanlines: Optional: lightly overlaid linear-gradient for Protocol Lab
visual_enhancers.loading: Skeleton loaders with a shimmering 'scan' effect

icons.usage: Use consistent stroke width. Tactical/Outline style.

elements: Hero: Full-screen dark image with 'Scanner' overlay.
Marquee: Scrolling carrier codes or protocol hashes.
Floaters: Status widgets (Weather, Traffic, Active Carriers).
Input: Large text area with line numbers.
Visual Grid: Representation of physical docks.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure green/red status colors pass 4.5:1 against the dark background.
accessibility.focus: High-vis white border on focus states.
accessibility.reduced_motion: Disable map fly-to animations if requested.

universal_guidelines: Implement `lenis` for smooth scrolling on the landing page.
Always use named exports for components.
DO NOT center align the app container.
Dark Mode is the DEFAULT and PRIMARY experience.
